title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Learning Based on Scientific Discovery Games for Quantum Computer Development

context.prior_knowledge: Linear algebra, quantum mechanics basics, and quantum gate concepts
context.additional_context: Students access a game-based learning platform via mobile devices and perform simulation tasks contributing to actual quantum computer development

learning_goals: Students can design optimized pulse sequences for quantum state control with 80% accuracy.
Learners can generate and analyze experimental data required for quantum algorithm implementation at least three times through collaborative problem-solving.
Learners can write a 5-page report on quantum phenomenon modeling by applying the scientific discovery process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
